text:
"And what view do you take of clairvoyance..."

"Oh, I see," said the bird.

passages.fragment: And what view do you take of clairvoyance
passages.full_quote: <used>And what view do you take of clairvoyance</used>
"It might depend, of course, on the view <used>you take of clairvoyance..." "Oh yes</used>"
said Richard, "well..." "O<used>h, I'd better j</used>ust check the messages first."
""Oh, you take the high road and I'll take the low road..."" "<used>Oh, I see</used>"
"<used>Oh, I see," said</used> Richard, "yes, that's rather easy, isn't it"
"Yes, through the economic recession you <used>see," said the</used> old man, apparently unconcerned about whether Arthur understood a word he was talking about or not
"No obviously n<used>ot," said the bird</used> after a few seconds
